video_prompt: A helmeted figure slowly carries a robot mermaid through a pristine, futuristic hallway. The carrier's head subtly tilts, maintaining a protective gaze downwards. The robot mermaid gently turns its head upwards, its serene expression shifting slightly with a blink, as glowing data flickers and scrolls across its metallic tail. Its translucent back-fins softly pulse. As they move, automated doors slide open, revealing more of the sterile, brightly lit environment, with subtle light shifts illuminating their passage.
